title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
created_time: March 19, 2023, 12:23:04 AMLast edit: April 02, 2023, 08:11:50 PM by Royse777
content: ABOUT THE CAMPAIGN🌔 Moon.win is a fully automated blockchain gaming platform with game written on the smart contract. Moonwin is your first WEB3 gaming platform. They want to advertise BitcoinTalk via an extensive signature campaign. Their goal is to build brand trust and loyalty over an initial campaign. As a member of this campaign, you are encouraged to make discussions, leave suggestions on other threads, and share your experience on Moonwin on their ANN thread.As the campaign manager, I hold 0.0360 BTC (≈ $1,000) in escrow to guarantee payment for members. Moonwin will top up this address regularly as the campaign progresses each week.ESCROW INFORMATIONbc1qrlzmjakpgy22lfzxy6xy0atx9l07mr7etgvdyunpx0uklq2pc6pqgqc3krCAMPAIGN REWARDS Hero+: $2.40 per post up to 25 posts each week.Sr. Member: $2.00 per post up to 25 posts each week.Full Member: $1.40 per post up to 25 posts each week.Member: $0.80 per post up to 25 posts each week.PREVENT AI DOMINATIONThis campaign is protected by Prevent AI Domination terms defined here:💹📈 Bitcointalk Campaign Management 💪🔥 Signature & Bounty. ▶️ If I find campaign members breaching these terms, I will remove them from the campaign immediately. ▶️ If you find AI-written posts for this campaign and report them to me publicly or via PM, you will receive the weekly payment instead of the accused campaigner (if your report was successful). Please include as much evidence as possible when submitting a report.CAMPAIGN RULES▶️ Wear the appropriate signature and avatar during the campaign▶️ Minimum of five posts a week to be eligible for payment▶️ Minimum of five posts in the "Gambling" and "Gambling Discussion" sections▶️ Maximum of ten posts in the "Gambling" and "Gambling Discussion" sections will be count towards payment▶️ Maximum of five posts on local boards▶️ Posts must be minimum of 150 characters long and constructive▶️ Posts in the following boards/sections are not eligible: "Off-Topic", "Archival, Games & Rounds", "Investor-Based Games", "Wall Observers", "Serious Discussion", "Altcoin Discussion", "Lending", "Press", "Politics & Society", other signature campaign threads, including this one, ANN threads (Except ANN of the campaign and ANN posted on the "Gambling" board are allowed), and areas where the signature is not visible▶️ No valid negative from DT network unless pre-approved by me▶️ Multi-account (alts) can apply but will need to give up all except only one if accepted more than one.▶️ Join my Telegram group: https://t.me/R7BountyQAIMPORTANT INFORMATION▶️ You are not allowed to change anything on the signature code. If you edit the signature code, I will disqualify you immediately▶️ I reserve the full right to add/remove any participants, push/cancel/reopen the campaign, or edit any rules of this campaign▶️ The week starts on Sunday and ends on Saturday(UTC)▶️ Please check the spreadsheet comment column and your payment information regularly.HOW TO APPLYReply to this thread with the following informationCode:Current number of posts (including this one):Rank:Bech32 address:..SPREADSHEET..AVATARLink : https://i.ibb.co/FX9Gxvt/moonwin-avatar.jpgSIGNATURESHERO &
